craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: On a kill or assist, gain an additional 15 Attack Damage until end of combat (Stacks infinitely).

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: Attacks deal an additional 9% enemy current Health as Physical Damage.

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: Heal for 33% of all damage dealt

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: After casting, wearer gains 18% of its max Mana per attack

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs: Wearer revives with 400 HP

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs: Attacks heal for 50% of damage

craf.name: ZekesHerald
craf.add_attrs: At the start of combat, allies within the same row gain +20% Attack Speed for the rest of combat

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs: +100% Crit. Dmg

craf.name: RapidFirecannon
craf.add_attrs: Attack Range is doubled

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Attack grant 5% Attack Speed. Stacks infinitely.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs: Deals 85 magic damage to 3 / 4 / 5 enemies (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer is hit or inflicts a critical strike, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus, up to 100%. At 50 stacks, the wearer gains 25 Armor and MR; and increases in size. Resets every round.

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: Summon a spirit who mirrors your attacks, dealing 60% Damage

craf.name: TitanicHydra
craf.add_attrs: 3% Max Health to target and adjacent enemies behind them.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs: Critical hits reduce the target’s Armor by 90% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: Wearer's Spell Power stat is amplified by 75%

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: Deals 150 / 175 / 225 magic damage (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

craf.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craf.add_attrs: Shields allies within two hexes in the same row for 250 / 275 / 350 damage for 8 seconds (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs: Enemies within 3 hexes that cast a spell are zapped, taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs: Spells deal burn damage equal to 18% of the enemy's maximum health over 10s and prevent healing

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs: Your spells can Crit

craf.name: SeraphsEmbrace
craf.add_attrs: Wearer regains 20 mana after spellcast

craf.name: FrozenHeart
craf.add_attrs: Adjacent enemies lose 40% Attack Speed. (Stacking increases the radius of this effect, not the amount of the slow)

craf.name: Hush
craf.add_attrs: 20% chance on hit to prevent the enemy champion from gaining mana for 4 seconds.

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: On crossing below 30% health, heal all nearby allies for 1200 Health

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs: Each planning phase, gain one: Deal 50% more damage / Gain 50 Life on Hit

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100 / 140 / 200 magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 1 second maximum). Scales with wearer’s Star Level.

craf.name: SwordBreaker
craf.add_attrs: 25% chance to disarm for 3 seconds

craf.name: RedBuff
craf.add_attrs: Gains 18% max hp true damage over 10 seconds on hit in addition to its burn

craf.name: IceborneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs: After casting a spell, the wearer’s next basic attack freezes the target for 2.5 seconds.

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs: Gain 50% resistance to magic damage

craf.name: Zephyr
craf.add_attrs: On start of combat, banish an enemy for 6 seconds

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs: [UNIQUE] The wearer is immune to crowd control.

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: Wearer regenerates 6% max Health per second.

craf.name: Backhand
craf.add_attrs: Start combat with a spell shield. Stun the champion that breaks it for 4 sec

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs: Each planning phase, fetch two temporary items, quality based upon your player level. [Consumes Three item Slots]

embl.name: YoumuusGhostblade
embl.add_attrs: Extra Attack Damage +20. Wearer is also an Assassin

embl.name: BladeoftheRuinedKing
embl.add_attrs: Extra AS +20%. Wearer is also a Blademaster

embl.name: FrozenMallet
embl.add_attrs: Extra HP +200. Wearer is also a Glacial

spec.name: Phantom Dancer
spec.desc: Wearer dodges the bonus damage from critical strikes

spec.name: Thornmail
spec.desc: Reflect 100% of damage mitigated from attacks

spec.name: Repeating Crossbow
spec.desc: On death, Repeating Crossbow bounces to a new unit and grants an extra +30% Attack Speed and +30% Crit chance
